G-1-text: How many actors were in the musical at Easter? Remember that some actors had several roles.

G-4-text: What did the representative from Italy shout out at the BUK-flying games?
G-4-B: Summer in Italy is the best!
G-4-D: Arrivederci, see you on the other side
